title: 如何防止生物被挤开
author: si_12
txt_content:
开发版本为1.12.2

如何防止玩家挤开某个生物 但又不用把全局的碰撞体积给关闭
类似Citizens中Npc那样 玩家无法挤开
最好不用Runnable或者玩家移动事件啥的来实现


求助大佬

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
LivingEntity#setCollidable复制代码     /**      * Set if this entity will be subject to collisions other entities.      *

     * Note that collisions are bidirectional, so this method would need to be      * set to false on both the collidee and the collidant to ensure no      * collisions take place.      *      * @param collidable collision status      */     void setCollidable(boolean collidable); 复制代码
